sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import Header from '../components/header' import FeatureCard from '../components/feature-card' import './home.css' import Table from './table' import AddPerson from './addPerson' const Home = (props) => { const [personData, setPersonData] = useState({ role: 'manager', name: null, surname: null, email: null, phone: null, gehalt: null, description: null, skype: null, KW: null, schulungsleitIDs: null, managerIDs: null, niveau: null, gruppenID: null, zahlungsID: null, schuelerManagerID: null }); const [personRole, setPersonRole] = useState({role: "manager"}); const [data, setData] = useState(null); const personChangeHandler = e => { const {name, value} = e.target; setPersonData(prevState => ({...prevState, [name]: value})); } const personRoleChangeHandler = e => { const {name, value} = e.target; // const oldRole = personData.role; // if (oldRole !== value) { setPersonData(prevState => { prevState.role === value ? prevState : { [name]: value, name: null, surname: null, email: null, phone: null, gehalt: null, description: null, skype: null, KW: null, schulungsleitIDs: null, managerIDs: null, niveau: null, gruppenID: null, zahlungsID: null, schuelerManagerID: null } }); document.getElementById('myForm').reset(); } const addPerson = () => { const name = personData.name; const surname = personData.surname; const email = personData.email; const phone = personData.phone.replace('+', '%2b'); switch(personRole.role) { case 'manager': const gehalt = personRole.gehalt; const description = personRole.description; fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?addPerson&role=manager&name=${name}&surname=${surname}&email=${email}&phone=${phone}&gehalt=${gehalt}&description=${description}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); break; case 'lehrer': const skype = personRole.skype; const KW = personRole.KW; const schulungsleitIDs = personRole.schulungsleitIDs; const managerIDs = personRole.managerIDs; fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?addPerson&role=lehrer&name=${name}&surname=${surname}&email=${email}&phone=${phone}&skype=${skype}&KW=${KW}&schulungsleitIDs=${schulungsleitIDs}&managerIDs=${managerIDs}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); break; case 'schueler': const niveau = personRole.skype; const gruppenIDs = personRole.KW; const zahlungIDs = personRole.schulungsleitIDs; const schuelerManagerIDs = personRole.managerIDs; fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db?addPerson&role=schueler&name=${name}&surname=${surname}&email=${email}&phone=${phone}&niveau=${niveau}&KW=${KW}&gruppenIDs=${gruppenIDs}&zahlungIDs=${zahlungIDs}&managerIDs=${schuelerManagerIDs}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); break; } } React.useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:3001/db`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setData(data); }).catch(err => console.log(err)); }, []); return (
